channel.title: Java error server turn off!
channel.description:
I woke up and checked my run.bat and it said this. I have a project insanity.
[code] # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d19a0fd, pid=5596, t id=6736 # # JRE version: 6.0_25-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (20.0-b11 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops) # Problematic frame: # C [awt.dll+0xfa0fd] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Zouu Zouuu\Desktop\ProjectX\hs_err_pid5596.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code. # See problematic frame for where to report the bug. # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And it has this error testfile in it.
Name of textile 'hs_err_pid5596'
Text file info:
[code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d19a0fd, pid=5596, tid=6736 # # JRE version: 6.0_25-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (20.0-b11 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops) # Problematic frame: # C [awt.dll+0xfa0fd] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code. # See problematic frame for where to report the bug. #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------

item.title: Java error server turn off!
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:2, topic:477305”]http://java.com/en/download/help/exception_access.xml[/quote]Thanks so much bro, you the man. <3

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:

http://java.com/en/download/help/exception_access.xml

item.title: Java error server turn off!
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

I woke up and checked my run.bat and it said this. I have a project insanity.

#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d19a0fd, pid=5596, t
id=6736
#
# JRE version: 6.0_25-b06
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (20.0-b11 mixed mode windows-amd64
compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [awt.dll+0xfa0fd]
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# C:\Users\Zouu Zouuu\Desktop\ProjectX\hs_err_pid5596.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

And it has this error testfile in it.
